data.name: About Me Text
data.value: I have been developing with Unity for {1} and with C# for {0}. During this time, I gained 1 year of experience working within a team (Office Sleeper, progress as of February 2023). Later, I joined an outsourcing company as a .NET Developer, where I am currently working ({2}). In my free time, I develop my own games independently. Examples of my work are provided below in the portfolio section.

data.name: BallmenDescription
data.value: Ballmen is a multiplayer/single-player 2D fighting platformer. The main goal is to score more points for your team before the timer runs out. You can achieve this by kicking opponents into their own team's basket or eliminating all lives of the opposing team. The game supports PC and Android platforms

data.name: CutCutDescription
data.value: CutCut - Casual game where you need to survive as long as possible without spending all your lives, while simultaneously sawing the box to count the score.

data.name: AirSmithDescription
data.value: Air Smith - WebGL game with local multiplayer for 2 players. The goal is gain more score than oponent player by destroying his space ship.
